Name: Without Within 3 (初衷)
About the game: Singaporeans have reported ghost sightings of Kiki, a calligrapher who had passed away several years ago. Meanwhile, Vinty receives a mysterious mail with a plane ticket to Singapore. As an aspiring calligrapher, she must learn the truth behind those Kiki appearances. Even in death, Kiki continues to steal the spotlight. Must Vinty remain as a nobody for as long as she lives (yeah, probably)? 'Make sure you stay hydrated honey!' - Vinty's mummy 'Omg, you're out with EXCELIA!?' - Vinty's sister 'Fantastic story!' - RealReviewer23
